# scam.makeup — Makeup & Cosmetics Scam Database

> Community-powered database of makeup & cosmetics scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the makeup & cosmetics industry.


scam.makeup is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the makeup & cosmetics industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Makeup & Cosmetics scam database and community reports](https://scam.makeup)


## Keywords

makeup & cosmetics scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.makeup
